All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IndexedPanel, java.lang.Iterable<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>, HasLayoutManager
public class ScrollLayoutPanel
extends LayoutPanel

A LayoutPanel that wraps its contents in a scrollable area.

Author:
georgopoulos.georgios(at)gmail.com
